Experts see even shorter attention span for children under online learning tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-740624 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/740624/experts-see-even-shorter-attention-span-for-children-under-online-learning/story/ Teachers and parents should brace for an even shorter attention span of kindergarten to middle school students under a new normal of online learning amid the COVID-19 pandemic, a mental health expert said Monday. Mon, 01 Jun 2020 13:04:43 +0800
Over 24,000 repatriated OFWs sent home -Palace tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-740622 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/740622/over-24-000-repatriated-ofws-sent-home-palace/story/ More than 24,000 overseas Filipino workers stranded in quarantine facilities in Metro Manila have returned to their respective hometowns, Malacañang said Monday. Mon, 01 Jun 2020 12:33:39 +0800
Sotto to DOH: Divert proposed P11.7-B contact tracing fund to COVID-19 treatment tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-740621 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/740621/sotto-to-doh-divert-proposed-p11-7-b-contact-tracing-fund-to-covid-19-treatment/story/ "It will be wiser and more practical to divert the P11.7 billion for the treatment of patients. We need funds to treat our sick kababayans. Mas mahalagang gamitin na lang ang pondong ito para sa pagbili ng mga gamot at medical equipment na makakatulong sa paggaling ng mga pasyente," Senate President Vicente Sotto III said. Mon, 01 Jun 2020 12:28:46 +0800
De Lima wants probe on mass testing for COVID-19 in Philippines tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-740619 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/740619/de-lima-wants-probe-on-mass-testing-for-covid-19-in-philippines/story/ The real score on mass testing for COVID-19 in the Philippines must be looked into, according to detained Senator Leila De Lima on Monday as the number of infected in the country continues to rise to over 18,000. Mon, 01 Jun 2020 12:18:06 +0800
DOH expects 'improved' submission of COVID-19 reports from licensed labs tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-740618 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/740618/doh-expects-improved-submission-of-covid-19-reports-from-licensed-labs/story/ The Department of Health (DOH) is expecting "improvement" in the way licensed laboratories submit their COVID-19 reports in the coming days, amid criticisms on how the department is recording the cases. Mon, 01 Jun 2020 12:14:56 +0800
Double plates on motorcycles to be delayed -- LTO exec tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-740617 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/740617/double-plates-on-motorcycles-to-be-delayed-lto-exec/story/ "'Yung implementation ng IRR (implementing rules and regulations) patungkol sa pagkakaroon ng plaka, hindi pa po natin maipapatupad dahil wala pa 'yung plaka pero ang magandang balita ngayon, nagsisimula nang mai-deliver 'yung mga plaka," LTO Operations Division OIC Mercy Jane Paras-Leynes said during the Laging Handa public briefing on Monday. "'Yung implementation ng batas doon sa plaka, yung pagkakaroon ng plaka sa harap at sa likod, hindi pa natin yan ma-i-implement," she added. Mon, 01 Jun 2020 12:10:32 +0800
Mga residente ng Boracay, pinayagan nang maligo sa beach tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-740616 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/ulatfilipino/740616/mga-residente-ng-boracay-pinayagan-nang-maligo-sa-beach/story/ Pinayagan na ng lokal na pamahalaan ng bayan ng Malay, Aklan ang mga residente ng Boracay na maligo sa beach. Mon, 01 Jun 2020 12:10:15 +0800

Mon, 01 Jun 2020 11:50:42 +0800
MMDA allows private vehicles to use EDSA yellow lanes tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-740615 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/metro/740615/mmda-allows-private-vehicles-to-use-edsa-yellow-lanes/story/ Private vehicles can use the yellow lanes as the bus lanes are now designated on the left side of EDSA, an official of the Metropolitan Manila Development Authority (MMDA) said Monday. Mon, 01 Jun 2020 11:43:10 +0800
House panel invites Gabby Lopez III to attend ABS-CBN franchise hearing tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-740613 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/740613/house-panel-invites-gabby-lopez-iii-to-attend-abs-cbn-franchise-hearing/story/ The House committee on legislative franchises is inviting ABS-CBN chairman emeritus Eugenio "Gabby" Lopez III to attend its next joint hearing with the committee on good government and public accountability on the television network's franchise issue. Mon, 01 Jun 2020 11:23:06 +0800
Villanueva bats for electronic voter registration as COVID-19 threat continues tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-740612 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/740612/villanueva-bats-for-electronic-voter-registration-as-covid-19-threat-continues/story/ "As part of our adjustment to the times, the Comelec (Commission on Elections) should be given an option to conduct the voter registration through electronic means. Not only does it make it more convenient for people to register, it will also help improve the data-keeping efforts of the commission," Senator Joel Villanueva said in a statement. "Creating an online platform will help lighten the burden of Comelec to process applications manually, and our people can be a registered voter right in the comfort and safety of our homes," he added. Mon, 01 Jun 2020 11:19:36 +0800
3 candidates for next Philippine Coast Guard chief named tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-740611 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/740611/3-candidates-for-next-philippine-coast-guard-chief-named/story/ Three senior flag officers were recommended to Transportation Secretary Arthur Tugade to be the next commander of the Philippine Coast Guard (PCG) following the retirement of Admiral Joel Garcia. Mon, 01 Jun 2020 11:16:42 +0800
IBP asks SC to make online trial court hearings the "general rule" tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-740608 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/740608/ibp-asks-sc-to-make-online-trial-court-hearings-the-general-rule/story/ The Integrated Bar of the Philippines (IBP) has asked the Supreme Court to refine guidelines under general community quarantine (GCQ) to make online trial court hearings the "general rule." Mon, 01 Jun 2020 11:05:55 +0800
Gamboa urges police units to offer rides amid GCQ in NCR tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-740602 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/740602/gamboa-urges-police-units-to-offer-rides-amid-gcq-in-ncr/story/ The Philippine National Police (PNP) on Monday called on all police units to offer rides to the public amid the limited mass transportation available under the general community quarantine in Metro Manila. Mon, 01 Jun 2020 10:22:31 +0800

Mon, 01 Jun 2020 10:11:57 +0800
